original_text: They failed because they refused to believe in Christ. Instead, they were trying to do certain things so that God would accept them. Because of that they fell to the ground. Their feet hit the stone which causes people to fall. They failed because they refused to believe in Christ. Instead, they were trying to do certain things so that God would accept them. Because of that they fell to the ground. Their feet hit the stone which causes people to fall.
korean_text: 어찌 그러하냐 이는 그들이 믿음을 의지하지 않고 행위를 의지함이라 부딪칠 돌에 부딪쳤느니라

sentences.original_text: They failed because they refused to believe in Christ.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그리스도를 믿기를 거부했기 때문에 실패했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Instead, they were trying to do certain things
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에, 그들은 특정한 일들을 하려고 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: so that God would accept them.
Because of that they fell to the ground.
Their feet hit the stone
which causes people to fall.
